archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.6.10d: d) identified threat events (e.g. denial of service attacks, malware and sabotage) that can exploit vulnerabilities relating to people, processes and technology
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
